title: <!--02-->Metamathematics: Foundations & Physicalization
description: Contributed by: Stephen Wolfram. Pre-order Metamathematics on Amazon now! “What is mathematics?” is a question that has been debated since antiquity. This book presents a groundbreaking and surprising answer to the question—showing through the concept of the physicalization of metamathematics how both mathematics and physics as experienced by humans can be seen to emerge from ...
